message.content:
To copy the contents of a cell in LibreOffice Calc and remove all single quotes, you can use the following formula:

=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","",1)

In this example, A1 is the cell reference where the original content is located. This formula will replace all occurrences of a single quote with an empty string (""). Replace "A1" with the actual cell reference you want to use in your spreadsheet.
